title: Executive Order 8813-Power Site Restoration No. 495. Partial Revocation of Executive Order of November 22, 1924, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 759
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421,36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, c. 369, 37 Stat. 497, the Executive order of November 22, 1924, creating Power Site Reserve No. 759, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:

T. 11 S., R. 20 W.,      sec. 5, lots 2, 3, 6, 7, 11, 14, and 19, SW¼ and W½SE¼;      sec. 6, E½SE¼;      sec. 7, E½;      sec. 8, W½NE¼, W½, W½SE¼, and SE¼SE¼;      sec. 15, W½E½, E½W½, and NW¼SW¼;      sec. 17, E½, and NW¼;      sec. 18, NE¼NE¼;      sec. 20, E½E½, and W½NE¼;      sec. 21, W½W½, SE¼SW¼, and SW¼SE¼;      sec. 22, NE¼, NE¼NW¼, and N½SE¼;      sec. 23, E½NW¼, and N½SW¼;      sec. 28, W½NE¼, NW¼, NE¼SW¼, and SE¼;      sec. 33, E½.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8813-Power Site Restoration No. 495. Partial Revocation of Executive Order of November 22, 1924, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 759 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368226
